alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Jefferson; Johnson; Laurens; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 8:31PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Baldwin, north central Laurens, Wilkinson, east central Twiggs, south central Hancock, south central Glascock, Washington, northwestern Johnson and west central Jefferson Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 830 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Warthen to Oconee to near Jeffersonville, and moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Sandersville, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Davisboro, Tennille, McIntyre, Harrison, Toomsboro, Oconee, Deepstep, Riddleville, Downs, Warthen, Linton, Grange, Nicklesville, Hebron and Chappells Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Glascock; Hancock; Jefferson; Johnson; Laurens; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson
